description: Here are some of my real-world full stack projects that showcase my ability to build scalable, modern and user-focused applications.
project_desc_1: A full stack platform that allows users to exchange skills, connect with others, and manage skill-based collaborations through a secure and user-friendly system.
project_features_1: Responsive UI built with React and Tailwind
project_desc_2: E-commerce platform with secure payments, product management and automated order system.
project_desc_3: SaaS platform for freelancers with authentication, role system, project management and dashboards.
project_features_3: Built with Next.js, Prisma and PostgreSQL
project_desc_4: A platform where users can exchange skills, connect with others, schedule sessions and manage learning categories.
project_features_4: Built with React, Node.js and PostgreSQL
project_desc_5: Enterprise-level platform for managing technical support tickets with automation, email notifications and role-based access.
project_features_5: Centralized ticket management with status and priority
Role system for Clients and Support Agents
Email notifications for ticket creation, updates and closure
Real-time dashboard with metrics and performance data
